mzziin/WorkNet-API.summary: Recent activities in the WorkNet-API repository include multiple improvements to the API, such as optimizing JWT service, adding support for JWT bearer token in Swagger UI, implementing pagination for the GetAllJobs endpoint, and adding remaining validations to DTOs. Additionally, various updates were made to the README.md file, and support for Docker was implemented, allowing for containerized API and SQL Server setup using Docker Compose.

mzziin/StockManager-API.summary: The StockManager-API repository has seen significant activity, with updates including the completion of category functionalities for admin, assign-manager service and controller, customer and supplier services, and warehouse services functionality. Other changes include adjusting namespaces for better readability and completing product buy and sell services from the warehouse, demonstrating substantial progress in the development of the API.

profile_summary:
Mohammed Mazin is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, C#, and JavaScript. With a solid track record of delivering high-quality solutions, he has established himself as a reliable and innovative professional in the field of software development. His extensive experience and expertise have enabled him to build a robust network of peers and collaborators, with 9 followers who recognize his technical prowess and value his contributions to the development community.

As a prolific developer with 18 public repositories to his credit, Mohammed Mazin has consistently demonstrated his ability to design, develop, and deploy innovative solutions that meet the evolving needs of the industry. His commitment to staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends has earned him a reputation as a forward-thinking and results-driven professional. With a unique blend of technical expertise and collaborative spirit, Mohammed Mazin is well-positioned to drive success in a wide range of development projects, and his profile is a testament to his dedication to excellence and his passion for delivering exceptional results.
